meta.title: Evidence Register (Investor Diligence)
rules: If a claim is not backed by a credible primary/secondary source, mark status = ASSUMPTION—VALIDATE and specify a validation_method.
Prefer primary sources (laws, government sites, regulator notices). If unavailable, use reputable secondary sources (major news, industry reports).
Store source artifacts in business_plan_rebuild/evidence/ when feasible and record local_path.

claims.claim_text: BMA waste disposal fees create a 20 THB/unit/month (separated) vs 60 THB/unit/month (mixed) differential used as the core compliance value proposition.
claims.excerpt: BMA household waste fee policy (effective Oct 2025): households up to 20L/day pay 60 THB/month if not separating waste; reduced to 20 THB/month if separating and registered via BKK WASTE PAY / district office process.
claims.validation_method: Archived the official BMA Greener Bangkok page and stored a local copy in evidence/.

claims.claim_text: Zone A market sizing table (Watthana/Khlong Toei/Huai Khwang condo counts and unit totals) is based on REIC data extrapolations.
claims.validation_method: Download REIC condo stock tables by district (or a cited summary), store in evidence/, and re-derive the table with transparent math.

claims.claim_text: Charging a service fee implies commercial transport requirements (Yellow Plate) and/or transport operator licensing considerations under DLT.
claims.excerpt: Transport Act B.E. 2522 provides the statutory basis for regulating public transport operations. Additional DLT guidance is still required to map the service model to specific plate class/operator license requirements.
claims.validation_method: Locate explicit DLT guidance defining (a) plate class/registration requirements for goods transport-for-hire and (b) operator licensing for fee-based hauling; store in evidence/; add excerpt.

claims.claim_text: Operations require a 'Business Detrimental to Health' license under Public Health Act B.E. 2535, Section 31, filed via Form Sor.Por.1 at the district office where the facility is located.
claims.excerpt: Public Health Act B.E. 2535: Section 31 authorizes licensing/controls for businesses classified as detrimental to health by the local competent authority; operations require a local license before commencement (district-level process).
claims.validation_method: Archived the Public Health Act PDF. Next: attach district office form/procedure (Sor.Por.1) for the target district to fully close the local-process detail.

claims.claim_text: VAT registration threshold is 1.8M THB annual turnover; once exceeded, invoices should add 7% VAT (unless exempt).
claims.excerpt: Revenue Department (VAT): entrepreneurs exceeding 1.8M THB annual turnover must register for VAT (and issue VAT invoices per RD rules).
claims.validation_method: Archived the official Revenue Department VAT page locally in evidence/.

claims.claim_text: Corporate clients commonly withhold tax (WHT) on service invoices (often 3%), reducing cash receipts but creditable against corporate income tax.
claims.excerpt: Revenue Department (WHT): payments for service/professional fees are subject to withholding tax (typically 3% when paid to a Thai company / PE).
claims.validation_method: Archived the official Revenue Department withholding tax guidance page locally in evidence/; model already reflects WHT in cash receipts.

claims.claim_text: Service fee of 90 THB/unit/month is achievable for target condos (300–600 units) in Zone A clusters.
claims.validation_method: Collect 10 juristic interviews + 2 signed LOIs with fee schedules; store signed LOIs (redacted) in evidence/.

claims.claim_text: Variable cost of 30 THB/unit/month (bags, consumables, disposal fees) is realistic at scale in Bangkok.
claims.validation_method: Obtain 3 supplier quotes (bags/consumables) + disposal fee evidence; store in evidence/ and update range.

claims.claim_text: Vehicle lease of 28,000 THB/month for an NPR-class truck (with commercial insurance) is realistic in Bangkok.
claims.validation_method: Request written lease quotes from Siam Rajathanee / Krungthai Car Rent; store in evidence/.

claims.claim_text: Facility rent of 35,000 THB/month is sufficient for a small consolidation warehouse in the Phra Khanong area.
claims.validation_method: Save 3 comparable listings (sqm, location, rent) to evidence/ and adjust range.

claims.claim_text: Driver salary 25k THB/month and loader salary 15k THB/month are sufficient to recruit and retain staff in Bangkok for condo-facing service work.
claims.validation_method: Capture 10 Bangkok job postings for similar roles + 2 recruiter quotes; store screenshots in evidence/.

claims.claim_text: Truck restriction windows (e.g., 06:00–09:00 and 16:00–20:00) materially constrain routes on Sukhumvit-area surface roads.
claims.excerpt: Secondary summary of Bangkok truck restriction windows (commonly cited: 06:00–09:00 and 16:00–20:00 for certain truck classes).
claims.validation_method: Retrieve official Bangkok truck restriction notice/map; store in evidence/; align ops schedule.

claims.claim_text: Investor repayment is structured as 10% of gross revenue paid quarterly until 1.5x cap (2.25M THB) is reached.
claims.validation_method: Create a term sheet appendix and ensure the waterfall.json matches this exactly.

claims.claim_text: Developer ESG programs (e.g., Sansiri/AP) create demand for building-level diversion reporting; we provide monthly reporting as a service deliverable.
claims.validation_method: Download Sansiri/AP ESG reports and cite the exact KPI language for waste/diversion reporting; store to evidence/.

claims.claim_text: Generated base case reaches positive net income at ~9 buildings (Month 12), and reaches ≥60k THB/month net income at ~12 buildings (Month 15).
claims.validation_method: Regenerate projections from model_inputs.json and confirm Month 12 net income (9 buildings) and Month 15 net income (12 buildings) match this claim; document the reconciliation in model_spec.md.

claims.claim_text: Under the generated revenue-share waterfall (10% quarterly, 1.5x cap), the cap is reached at Month 54 (~4.5 years).
claims.validation_method: Confirm `financials/waterfall.json` reaches cap_amount (2.25M) at payment_month 54 and that investor_relations narrative matches; keep derived timeline tied to generated artifacts.

claims.claim_text: Mixed fleet is required to service low-clearance basements: primary NPR-class truck + rescue unit (Suzuki Carry / low-profile pickup cage).
claims.validation_method: Attach manufacturer spec sheets for candidate vehicles and at least 5 completed site surveys showing dock height constraints; store in evidence/.

claims.claim_text: Leasing via a licensed fleet provider (e.g., Siam Rajathanee / Krungthai Car Rent) bridges the Yellow Plate/operator licensing lead time in Year 1.
claims.validation_method: Obtain written lease proposal/terms confirming vehicle plate class + included insurance/maintenance; store in evidence/.
